nodes.text: A transceiver tooth was a device that Conder Kyl used to relay his coordinates after he had been kidnapped by Red Key Raiders and Black Sun criminals during the Mission to Nakadia in 5 ABY. Conder used his tongue to flip the transceiver tooth's broadcast to their channel. He managed to transmit the location of his warehouse in time for Sinjir Rath Velus and Han Solo to arrive in the Millennium Falcon and subdue the gangsters.
